name: Jonesy9027
about: I'm a 28 year old Marine from the US. I have never played the TCG but I got into Duel Links when it first came out watching Shady Penguinn play it. I don't play much competitively, but I'm happy doing what I can to help build this community by maintaining a steady flow of quality content to this website. (Discord: Jonesy9027#0001)
accomplishments: 10 time King of Games,4 time KC Cup Participant,Expert at Autodueling,I have almost seen all of GX
